snippet: They warned all residents of the area — roughly 14 million people — to stay indoors if possible because of the poor air quality.
abstract: Iranian health authorities in Tehran warn residents to stay indoors as intense smog engulfs capital.
lead_paragraph: They warned all residents of the area — roughly 14 million people — to stay indoors if possible because of the poor air quality.

headline.print_headline: Middle East; Iran: Smog Envelops Tehran
